original_title: KAMIJO - Sang Live at Zepp DiverCity Tokyo
overview: Features "KAMIJO Live Tour 2018 -Sang- Final" held at Zepp DiverCity Tokyo on July 15, 2018. Popular voice actors, Tomokazu Seki, Tomokazu Sugita, Ruriko Aoki, and Hironori Kondo performed with KAMIJO at the concert. In addition, Hatsune Miku appears as a special guest.
title: KAMIJO - Sang Live at Zepp DiverCity Tokyo
